pullRequest.title: BXC-2753 - Prevent storage of FITS error mimetypes in transformations
pullRequest.bodyText:
https://jira.lib.unc.edu/browse/BXC-2753

Prevent setting mimetype in deposit if it matches the pattern for FITS errors
Update transformation tests to check for mimetype setting

commit.message: Prevent storage of FITS error mimetypes in transformations

nodes.bodyText: Is this checking that mimetype property is empty?
